title: Riot points
body: Hey, i just bought some riot points on league of legends and i paid and everything but they arent added to my account is that an error or is it just that they need some time to arrive?

replies.body: Is this still an issue?  Depending on the transaction, it could be a bit to go from pending to finalized.  If this is still an issue, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing will assist directly!
